name: Guardian of the jungle
description:
This game is a kind of tower defense Beat'em Game. The core game is the horizontal shooting game of tower defense. Players need to choose the direction of team growth, allocate resources to improve team growth, and all character attacks will consume ammunition. They also need to consume resources to provide ammunition support for each team member, so as to maintain a stable fire output. Kill monsters in a limited time. The less time it takes, the higher the reward. There are many kinds of ammunition to choose from in the game, It's the most refreshing place in this game to dump ammunition and bombard the enemy Interactive communication
You are welcome to leave your comments. I will carefully listen to the comments and feed them back to the subsequent game production. You can also add friends of the author. Other works of the author will be presented and distributed irregularly through this channel
